verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱ‍ֽהַב־ <S%H157><s%> yet love אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> a woman אֲהֻ֥בַת <S%H157><s%> beloved רֵ֖עַ <S%H7453><s%> of [her] friend וּמְנָאָ֑פֶת <S%H5003><s%> yet an adulteress כְּאַהֲבַ֤ת <S%H160><s%> according to the love יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> toward the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> they פֹּנִים֙ <S%H6437><s%> who look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> to other וְאֹהֲבֵ֖י <S%H157><s%> and love אֲשִׁישֵׁ֥י <S%H809><s%> flagons עֲנָבִֽים׃ <S%H6025><s%> of wine

וָאֶכְּרֶ֣הָ <S%H3739><s%> So I bought לִּ֔י בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver וְחֹ֥מֶר <S%H2563><s%> and [for] an homer שְׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley וְלֵ֥תֶךְ <S%H3963><s%> and an half homer שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <S%H8184><s%> of barley

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And I said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> be toward יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> for me many תֵּ֣שְׁבִי <S%H3427><s%> unto her Thou shalt abide לִ֔י לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִזְנִ֔י <S%H2181><s%> thou shalt not play the harlot וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִֽהְיִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> and thou shalt not be לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for [another] man וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H413><s%> be toward

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> many יֵֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> shall abide בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> without a king וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without שָׂ֔ר <S%H8269><s%> and without a prince וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and without זֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> and without a sacrifice וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without מַצֵּבָ֑ה <S%H4676><s%> and without an image וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without אֵפ֖וֹד <S%H646><s%> and without an ephod וּתְרָפִֽים׃ <S%H8655><s%> and [without] teraphim

אַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> Afterward יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> return בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> shall the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבִקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1245><s%> and seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> and David מַלְכָּ֑ם <S%H4428><s%> their king וּפָחֲד֧וּ <S%H6342><s%> and shall fear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to טוּב֖וֹ <S%H2898><s%> and his goodness בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> in the latter הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days פ
